SELECT eva.id, eva.score, eva.content, eva.create_date AS createDate, oi.code, oi.price, oi.day_num AS dayNum, ui.name AS userName, ui.avatar, rt.name, hi.name AS hotelName FROM evaluation eva LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON (oi.id = eva.order_id) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = oi.user_id ) LEFT JOIN room_type rt ON ( rt.id = oi.type_id ) LEFT JOIN hotel_info hi ON ( hi.id = oi.hotel_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.userName},'%')
AND hi.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.userId},'%')
AND hi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.hotelName},'%')
AND rt.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluation.roomName},'%')

SELECT eva.content, eva.create_date, ui.avatar, ui.name FROM evaluation eva LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( oi.id = eva.order_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = eva.user_id ) WHERE oi.type_id = #{ roomTypeId }
